text: Henry Hall (1810 – 1 December 1864) was an English cricketer who played first- class cricket from 1827 to 1837. Hall played for Sheffield Cricket Club and made 14 known appearances in first-class matches.CricketArchive. Retrieved on 2 December 2008. He represented the North in the North v. South series. ==References== Category:1810 births Category:1864 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:English cricketers of 1826 to 1863 Category:Sheffield Cricket Club cricketers Category:North v South cricketers Category:Cricketers from Sheffield
title: Henry Hall (cricketer, born 1810)
